sentences.sContent: Is there enough room for me?
...If it is hard enough to define a team’s membership...

...The company spent the last five years developing solar panels that are only about a quarter of inch thick and are strong enough to stand up to heavy highway traffic without breaking or making the roads more slippery...
...‖ though if you are smart enough to get into these schools...
...you are either smart enough to get around any codes or hopefully...
...chains big enough to fall under the rule will face penalties about 2000 dollars for not showing calorie information in a prominent spot on their menus preferably next to the price...
...New evidence shows why getting enough sleep is a top priority...
...you’ll save yourself time when you find a job that leaves you with enough time to get your school work done...
...A part time job is a good way to balance costs while ensuring there is enough time left over for both academic subjects and after-class activities...
...I’ve had enough of our canteen food...
...He says there are not enough buyers willing to pay more for the purple tea...

phrases.pCn: 足够地，充分的；对……足够的
说来也奇怪（用作插入语）
有很大的困难，需要全力以赴
绰绰有余，足够而且有余

trans.tranOther: used before plural or uncountable nouns to mean ‘as many or as much as sb needs or wants ’
